::KitKat::
She whispered her final words as her spark 
faded. "Drill..bit...I..love..you..Drillbit..." Her final breath 
escaped past her lips.  The light in her eyes faded and her spark 
beat it's final time.  Her body jerked in it's death throws. Then 
remained still.  Her lifeless body lay in the CR.  The venom had done 
it's work. KitKat was gone.


KitKat's clone, which had been left in the storage area, fell over 
lifeless as the source of it's life passed away.
